examples.example: 无论遇到什么困难，我们都要勇敢地面对面前的挑战。

translate.english: No matter what difficulties we encounter, we should bravely face the challenges ahead.

examples.example: 当机会出现在面前时，我们要牢牢抓住。

translate.english: When the opportunity appears in front of us, we should firmly grasp it.

examples.example: 站在新的起点面前，我们充满信心地展望未来。

translate.english: Standing in front of the new starting point, we look forward to the future with full confidence.
